:::config { "language": "javascript", "theme": "slack-theme-ochin" }
CustomRenderer.prototype.matchedRangeModifier = function (content, prefix = '') {
    let pattern = new RegExp(escapeRegex(prefix) + ':?((start|end|all|-?[0-9]+)(,-?[0-9]+)?)?', 'i');

    return content.match(pattern);
}
:::expectation
<pre><code data-theme='slack-theme-ochin' data-lang='javascript' class='phiki language-javascript slack-theme-ochin torchlight' style='background-color: #FFF;color: #000;--theme-selection-background: #5899C5'><!-- Syntax highlighted by Phiki and torchlight.dev --><div class='line'><span style="color: #b9b9b9; text-align: right; -webkit-user-select: none; user-select: none;" class="line-number">1</span><span class="token" style="color: #dc3eb7;">CustomRenderer</span><span class="token" style="color: #002339;">.</span><span class="token" style="color: #002339;">prototype</span><span class="token" style="color: #002339;">.</span><span class="token" style="color: #7eb233;">matchedRangeModifier</span><span class="token"> </span><span class="token" style="color: #7b30d0;">=</span><span class="token"> </span><span class="token" style="color: #0991b6;">function</span><span class="token"> </span><span class="token" style="color: #002339;">(</span><span class="token" style="color: #b1108e;">content</span><span class="token" style="color: #002339;">,</span><span class="token"> </span><span class="token" style="color: #b1108e;">prefix</span><span class="token"> </span><span class="token" style="color: #7b30d0;">=</span><span class="token"> </span><span class="token" style="color: #a44185;">&#039;</span><span class="token" style="color: #a44185;">&#039;</span><span class="token" style="color: #002339;">)</span><span class="token"> </span><span class="token" style="color: #002339;">{</span><span class="token">

:::end
